author: ajsutton
content: Sorry but this isn't the appropriate place for questions like that. This server is for research and development into the Ethereum protocol itself.

author: ben_a_adams
content:
Also alternative is EIP-7778 https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9802 where refunds still exist (behavior encouragement), but aren't counted towards block gas accounting (resource constraint)

e.g. block gas is gross, not net

author: jochembrouwer
content: Ahhh right I remember seeing this EIP, but I forgot! Yes this is actually a better proposal because this indeed keeps the benefits of the refunds but also removes the illogical things to reason about (block gas limit is not actual execution limit currently)

author: jochembrouwer
content: Oh its an open PR. I'll review it ðŸ™‚
